properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 5 at 3:18AM CST until January 6 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Lakeshore
Flood Advisory...which is in effect from 3 PM this afternoon to
6 AM CST Monday.

* WINDS AND WAVES...West to west northwest winds gusting to 45 mph
will build waves to 6 to 9 feet and occasionally to 12 feet
along the Porter County shore.

* TIMING...3 PM this afternoon through tonight.

* IMPACTS...The increasing wave action this afternoon and tonight,
combined with ongoing shoreline erosion may result in additional
lakeshore flooding along the Porter County shoreline. The water
may threaten some roads near the lake, including Lakefront
Drive in the Beverly Shores area.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST MONDAY
